name: Endless Wasteland
description:
I'm a 22 year old games development student from Plymouth, UK. I'm currently in my 3rd year of university and made this as a part of the design for entertainment systems module for the course. I have made several games in the past such as Another F***ing Zombie Game, Block Assault and Apartment Escape. If you're interested in my next project, you can follow my twitter at @SplitzDev and check out my portfolio website on my profile page.

CREDITS 

Game Design: Alex Davis

This game uses the A* Pathfinding Package made by Aron Granberg.

Graphics: Kenny.nl, Stephen "Redshrike" Challener, William.Thompsonj

Music: nyoko, CO.AG Music
